Former Republican state Mike Pence Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Mike Pence Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear front-runner, and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.'' Charles Woodson has been impressed with Tramon Williams , who took over for Al Harris at cornerback and clinched the wild-card win vs. the Philadelphia Eagles by intercepting Michael Vick in the end zone to preserve a 21-16 lead. He's playing lights-out football, Charles Woodson said of Tramon Williams on Fox's Sunday telecast.
